nl.strohalm.cyclos.dao.customizations

Interface CustomFieldValueDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseDAO<CustomFieldValue>, DeletableDAO<CustomFieldValue>, InsertableDAO<CustomFieldValue>, UpdatableDAO<CustomFieldValue>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomFieldValueDAOImpl

    public interface CustomFieldValueDAO
extends BaseDAO<CustomFieldValue>, InsertableDAO<CustomFieldValue>, UpdatableDAO<CustomFieldValue>, DeletableDAO<CustomFieldValue>
    Data access object interface for custom fields values
    Author:
    rafael

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CustomFieldValue load(CustomField field, java.lang.Object owner, Relationship... fetch)
      Loads a custom field value by field type and owner
      int moveValues(CustomFieldPossibleValue oldValue, CustomFieldPossibleValue newValue)
      Moves all occurences of the old value to the new value, returning the number of affected values
      int unHideValues(MemberCustomField field)
      Unhides all occurrences of a custom member field, that is, sets hidden to false.
      boolean valueExists(CustomFieldValue value)
      Checks if the given custom field value exists.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        CustomFieldValue load(CustomField field,
                    java.lang.Object owner,
                    Relationship... fetch)
                      throws EntityNotFoundException,
                             UnexpectedEntityException
        Loads a custom field value by field type and owner
        Throws:
        EntityNotFoundException - No such value exists
        UnexpectedEntityException - Invalid owner

      • moveValues

        int moveValues(CustomFieldPossibleValue oldValue,
             CustomFieldPossibleValue newValue)
        Moves all occurences of the old value to the new value, returning the number of affected values

      • unHideValues

        int unHideValues(MemberCustomField field)
        Unhides all occurrences of a custom member field, that is, sets hidden to false.
        Parameters:
        field - a MemberCustomField
        Returns:
        number of changed/updated field values.

      • valueExists

        boolean valueExists(CustomFieldValue value)
        Checks if the given custom field value exists. The value owner is not counted on the check. This method is used to check uniqueness.
